mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_staff (staff_name, staff_rank, staff_email, staff_ph) VALUES(#{staffName}, #{staffRank}, #{staffEmail}, #{staffPh})
mapper.select:
select staff_no, staff_name, staff_rank, staff_email, staff_ph from tb_staff
and staff_no = #{staffNo}
and staff_name like CONCAT('%',#{staffName},'%')
and staff_rank like CONCAT('%',#{staffRank},'%')
and staff_email like CONCAT('%',#{staffEmail},'%')
and staff_ph like CONCAT('%',#{staffPh},'%')
LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}

select count(*) from tb_staff
and staff_no = #{staffNo}
and staff_name like CONCAT('%',#{staffName},'%')
and staff_rank like CONCAT('%',#{staffRank},'%')
and staff_email like CONCAT('%',#{staffEmail},'%')
and staff_ph like CONCAT('%',#{staffPh},'%')
